p:
Intact LTR retrotransposons were identified by searching the genomes of A. trifoliata with LTR_Finder
61 and LTR_STRUC
82 . According to the sequence divergence, the insertion times of the identified full-length LTR retrotransposons were estimated with Dismat (EMBOSS package)
83 . The average base substitution rate of 1.3E-08 per site per year was used to calculate the insertion times
84 .
